predictions.match: West Ham United FC v Chelsea FC

result.analysis: West Ham lost heavily in their first match, while Chelsea drew. Chelsea are slight favourites, but West Ham at home could put up a fight. A draw seems the most likely outcome.

overUnder.analysis: West Ham have shown they can concede goals. Chelsea have a new attack so may need some time to gel. The probability is slightly in favor of under 2.5 goals.

bothTeamsToScore.analysis: Both teams have the attacking quality to score, but Chelsea are not firing on all cylinders. This will likely be a tight game.

predictions.match: Manchester City FC v Tottenham Hotspur FC

result.analysis: Manchester City started strongly with a 4-0 win. Tottenham also won, but City's attacking power is formidable, especially at home. City are heavy favorites.

overUnder.analysis: Man City scored 4, and Tottenham scored 3. City are likely to score at least twice, and Tottenham have the attacking threat to find the net. This should be an open game.

bothTeamsToScore.analysis: Tottenham will likely get one goal. City will score more than one.

predictions.match: AFC Bournemouth v Wolverhampton Wanderers FC

result.analysis: Bournemouth lost their first match, conceding 4. Wolves also lost, failing to score. Bournemouth at home have a slight edge. This is a tough one to call.

overUnder.analysis: Neither team is particularly strong in attack. Wolves didn't score in their first match; Bournemouth scored a couple but also conceded 4.

bothTeamsToScore.analysis: Both teams are struggling with goals. The chances of both scoring are unlikely.

predictions.match: Brentford FC v Aston Villa FC

result.analysis: Brentford lost their first match, conceding 3. Villa drew scoring 0. Villa have quality, but Brentford at home can be tough to beat. A draw is a distinct possibility.

overUnder.analysis: Brentford's first game had over 2.5 goals, Villa's had under. Expecting a few goals here.

bothTeamsToScore.analysis: Both teams should find the net in this match.

result.analysis: Burnley lost 3-0, while Sunderland won 3-0. Sunderland are in good form. However Burnley are a new team and may improve.

overUnder.analysis: Burnley may struggle to score many goals.

bothTeamsToScore.analysis: Sunderland are in form and may keep a clean sheet.

predictions.match: Arsenal FC v Leeds United FC

result.analysis: Arsenal won their first game, Leeds won too, but Arsenal are the better team. Leeds are likely to struggle against Arsenal's attack.

overUnder.analysis: Arsenal are strong defensively and may not concede.

predictions.match: Crystal Palace FC v Nottingham Forest FC

result.analysis: Palace drew their first game, Forest won. Forest are a decent team but Palace at home will be hard to beat.

overUnder.analysis: This will be a tight game.

predictions.match: Everton FC v Brighton & Hove Albion FC

result.analysis: Everton lost their first game, Brighton drew. Brighton are slightly the better team.

overUnder.analysis: This will be a tight game.

predictions.match: Fulham FC v Manchester United FC

result.analysis: Fulham drew, Man U lost. Man U have more quality and should win, although Fulham are a hard team to beat.

overUnder.analysis: This will be a tight game.

predictions.match: Newcastle United FC v Liverpool FC

result.analysis: Newcastle drew their first game, Liverpool won. Liverpool are a much better team and should win.

overUnder.analysis: Liverpool should score a few goals.
